description: Aaron and Harry are a pair of good looking blond lads - both with cheeky grins, that tease, but so far they've been reluctant to pair up with other guys! However this time we've got them together and persuade them to try a bit of sword fighting! Both lads are in good shape, both with a bit of stubble, Aaron has a little light hair on his chest, Harry is otherwise smooth. The lads strip off their clothes, comparing muscles, and getting ready to compare the important one! Although its pushing their boundaries, both lads have disarming grins on their face, and Aaron his trademark piercing blue eyes. The guys strip right down, and smack their cocks against each other when soft, then start wanking and sword fighting when hard too. Both guys happily show off their hole, by getting on all fours in front of us, then flip back over and finish themselves off - Harry shoots first, and Aaron next - both nice big loads which end up dribbling off their abs!
title: Straight Blond Hunks Aaron & Harry Have a Sword Fight - Their 1st Man Contact!
